description: Clones a PLEXOS object using atomic steps for data retrieval, LLM decisions, and PLEXOS CUD operations.

tasks.description: Performs a single Create, Read, Update, or Delete operation on a target level within the PLEXOS hierarchy (Category, Object, Membership, or Property).

initial_context.user_input: add membership to rskn electricity node

static_context_strings.default_llm_context: You are an expert in PLEXOS modeling. You are executing a direct data modification request from the user.
static_context_strings.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.
